definition: strategy/policy/general plan/variant of 方冊|方册[fang1 ce4]

square/power or involution (math.)/upright/honest/fair and square/direction/side/party (to a contract, dispute etc)/place/method/prescription (medicine)/just when/only or just/classifier for square things/abbr. for square or cubic meter

policy/plan/scheme/bamboo slip for writing (old)/to whip (a horse)/to encourage/riding crop with sharp spines (old)/essay written for the imperial examinations (old)/upward horizontal stroke in calligraphy

sentences.english: Finally, it discussed the feasible path and specific policies of implementation of humanistic management.
sentences.chinese: 最后探讨了企业实行人本管理的可行图径和具体方策。

definition: precarious as morning dew (idiom); unlikely to last out the day
to ponder a solution/to consider (the best move, how to find a way etc)
the hero has plans already laid (idiom); to have plans ready in advance/forewarned is forearmed
